item.title: My Reading List
item.description: Currently Reading Coming Soon. Engineering Books Optical Springer Handbook of Optical Networks - This is a in-depth book on optical networking for all types of deployment. This is a bible. You have to use this as reference book. As of now, I have concentrated on the data center networking and its related chapters.
